title: Ranked 5's high bronze/low silver team
body: Looking for bronze/silver players who are willing to join a ranked team. I would prefer it if you had skype but anyone is welcome. Just gonna have some fun and try and earn these ranked rewards. if you have any enquiries just message me (KillerLlama) and as soon as I can get 5 of us together we will start.

replies.body: Hi, if you don't mind having a diamond 5, a bot lane main (can fill most roles quite decently above avg). My mains are most Adcs, Supp are mainly janna, thresh. Top lane i can play riven, gnar, shen, nasus and afew others. Jg i can play udyr, gragas, elise, j4, eve, lee, rengar, kha and a bunch. Mid basically any champ. Can skype. If interested add me

Hey man, Im Bronze 2, a top/jungle main but im good at adc and mid if need be. My mains would be renekton and volibear top, shaco or vi jungle, trist or vayne adc, zed, ahri or kat mid. My skype is Corey.Taylor352 and my ign is Corey944
lel, u have the same name as me. will add u asap

Hi im b4, but i was b1 had a big drop in lp, i play any role i am confident in all of them.
Adc>Jungle>Top>Support>Mid are my prefs in order
welcome to the team! just let me know when u find out which role u wish to play and ill fit it into the composition

Hey man 
im in bronze 1, looking to get into silver, i am interested in joining your team
i can play anything but main Mid, jg and sup. I have skype aswell so im all good there.

Skype: jacob.goodall
League name: The Gingninj69

please get back to me if i am in the team :){{champion:245}}
most definitely want you in. All up to u tho (u'll end up in the mid lane more than likely)

Hey man

I am Silver 5 and am trying to climb to gold.

I am interested in joining your team, I can play any role but main adc and top.

I have added you and i look forward to talking to you about this soon

Thanks

Chrome Shadow {{champion:18}}
you are more than welcome in the team

Hey i would love to join if its ok that im not bronze or silver

im platinum 3 at the moment and main jungle/support

IGN: Rocka
you are more than welcome in the team, although as a support main myself you will more than likely end up in the jg (if that's ok with you)
I am B3, and I main both bot lane roles. IGN: UnholyDemigod
